content: **pattern notes** the body of the pillow is worked in the round you will not chain 1 and start a new round mark the first worked stitch and continue in the round as you go **materials needed** * 6mm hook * 4mm hook * bernat blanket yarn * worsted weight yarn in white black pink blue and yellow * stitch markers * tapestry needle * poly-fil stuffing * quilting pins optional * tapestry needle not optional **gauge notes** this pattern does not have a gauge it s just a little throw pillow and i didn t think it needed one to be honest the finished product should come out to be about a foot in diameter **yarn** you will use a little less than half skein of bernat blanket yarn for this project about 2-3 yards each of pink blue yellow and black and approximately 5 yards of white for the eyes this was a scrap yarn project i made so i did not keep track of how much yarn i was actually using this is just my best estimate
